title: How to Search for File Types in Finder on a Mac

steps.title: Type "kind:
steps.content: Type " kind: " into the search bar in the upper right.

steps.title: Type in the file type you're looking for.
steps.content: Type in the file type you're looking for. Some valid searches are: name music png doc app font bookmark

steps.title: Add in another search query.
steps.content: Add in another search query. If you're trying to narrow down to a specific file, type in another query to search alongside the file types.
